experience.title: Frontend Intern
contributions: Implemented and contributed to the redevelopment of ChamsSwitch’s company website alongside team members, creating a 100% responsive UI with reusable components.
Worked on building interactive UI elements such as accordions, carousels, sticky menus, and form validation to enhance the user experience.
Gained experience with API integration and event handling, retrieving and posting data to backends and adding dynamic functionality to the application.
